member.name: T:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfCompressionType
member.summary: Specifies the type of compression to use on the image data.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfCompressionType.None
member.summary: No compression is used.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfCompressionType.CcittGroup4
member.summary: Uses CCITT Group4 Fax compression on the image data. This can only be used on 1-bit images. If you attempt to use this compression on an image of another type, it will default to Auto compression mode.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfCompressionType.Jpeg
member.summary:
The image is saved as a JPEG. You may also want to set the
JpegQuality of the
PdfEncoder. This can only be used for 8-bit grayscale, 24-bit and CMYK images. If you attempt to use this compression with any other image format, it will use Auto instead.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfCompressionType.Deflate
member.summary: Uses Deflate compression on the image data.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfCompressionType.Auto
member.summary: This will tell the PdfEncoder to automatically determine which compression to use.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfCompressionType.Jbig2
member.summary: Use Jbig2 compression on the image data. This compression is only available for 1 bit per pixel images.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfCompressionType.Jpeg2000
member.summary: Use Jpeg2000 compression on the image data. This setting works only for RGB color or grayscale images.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfPageSizeMode
member.summary:
Used to set the page
SizeMode of a PDF document created with
PdfEncoder.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfPageSizeMode.FitToImage
member.summary:
This will cause each page to be resized to the size of the image, plus any
PageBorder.

member.name: F:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfPageSizeMode.FitToPage
member.summary:
This will make each page in the PDF the same
PageSize. If an image is too large to fit in the page, it will be rendered smaller in order to fit. If the image is smaller than the page, it will be centered.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfEncoder
member.summary: An ImageEncoder that will write one or more images to a PDF file.
member.remarks:
To use the
PdfEncoder, simply pass an instance of the PdfEncoder to the
Workspace.Save or
AtalaImage.Save method and it will save all images from the Images Property of the Workspsace object into the PDF File. To compose a multipage PDF document from images not in memory all at once, or at a specified compression format, follow the steps in the example below. DotImage Document Imaging is required for PDF Encode functionality.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfEncoder._ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of PdfEncoder.Creates a PdfEncoder object.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfEncoder._ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of PdfEncoder.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfEncoder._ctor(System.Int32,Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfPageSizeMode,System.Drawing.Size,System.Int32,Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfMetadata)
member.summary: Creates an instance of PdfEncoder specifying jpegQuality, sizeMode, pageSize, pageBorder and metadata.
member.param: The Jpeg quality used when the image compression is set to Jpeg.
The size method used when creating the page.
The page size in pixels.
The page border used for this image.
The metadata for this PDF file.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of PdfEncoder specifying metadata.
member.param: The metadata for this PDF file.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of PdfEncoder specifying sizeMode, pageSize, pageBorder and metadata.
member.param: The size method used when creating the page.
The page size in pixels.
The page border used for this image.
The metadata for this PDF file.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfEncoder.Save
member.summary: Creates the PDF file.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfEncoder.Save(System.IO.Stream,Atalasoft.Imaging.AtalaImage,Atalasoft.Imaging.ProgressEventHandler)
member.summary: Creates a single page PDF file.
member.returns: The number of bytes written.
member.remarks: Uses the default compression (Auto) when saving individual images.
member.param: The stream to write the PDF file into. This stream must be seekable.
The AtalaImage to encode.
The progress delegate. Can be set to null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfEncoder.Save(System.IO.Stream,Atalasoft.Imaging.ImageCollection,Atalasoft.Imaging.ProgressEventHandler)
member.summary: Creates a PDF file containing all of the images in the ImageCollection.
member.returns: The number of bytes written.
member.param: The stream to write the PDF file into. This stream must be seekable.
The ImageCollection containing images to save.
The progress delegate. Can be set to null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfEncoder.Save(System.IO.Stream,Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfImageCollection,Atalasoft.Imaging.ProgressEventHandler)
member.summary:
Creates a PDF file containing all of the images in the
PdfImageCollection.
member.returns: The number of bytes written.
member.param: The stream to write the PDF file into. This stream must be seekable.

The
PdfImageCollection containing images to save.
The progress delegate. Can be set to null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfEncoder.ToByteArray
member.summary: Saves the Pdf to a byte array.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfEncoder.ToByteArray(Atalasoft.Imaging.AtalaImage,Atalasoft.Imaging.ProgressEventHandler)
member.summary: Saves a single image as a PDF to a byte array.
member.param: The image to save.
The progress delegate. Can be set to null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfEncoder.ToByteArray(Atalasoft.Imaging.ImageCollection,Atalasoft.Imaging.ProgressEventHandler)
member.summary: Save an ImageCollection as PDF to a byte array.
member.param: The ImageCollection to save.
The progress delegate. Can be set to null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfEncoder.ToByteArray(Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfImageCollection,Atalasoft.Imaging.ProgressEventHandler)
member.summary: Saves a PdfImageCollection as PDF to a byte array.
member.param: The PdfImageCollection to save.
The progress delegate. Can be set to null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfEncoder.JpegQuality
member.summary: Gets or sets the JPEG quality used when the image compression is set to Jpeg.
member.returns: The Jpeg quality used when the image compression is set to Jpeg.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfEncoder.Metadata
member.summary: Gets or sets the metadata information used for this PDF.
member.returns: The metadata information used for this PDF.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfEncoder.PageBorder
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of border space around the image in pixels.
member.returns: The amount of border space around the image in pixels.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfEncoder.PageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the PDF pages in pixels. PDF uses an internal resolution of 72dpi, so an 8.5 x 11 inch page would be 612 x 792 pixels.
member.returns: The size of the PDF pages in pixels.
member.remarks:
This value is only used if
SizeMode is FitToPage.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfEncoder.SizeMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the page size mode for this PDF.
member.returns: The page size mode for this PDF.
member.remarks:
FitToImage will cause the page to be sized to fit the image, while FitToPage will cause the image to be fit to the page. See
PdfPageSizeMode for more detail.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfEncoder.Xmp
member.summary: Gets or sets a byte array containing XMP data.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfImage
member.summary: Contains information about a single image or file to be added to the PDF.
member.remarks: This object is used for more low level control when saving a PDF image using the PdfEncoder.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfImage._ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of PdfImage.

member.summary: Creates an instance of PdfImage specifying image and compression.
member.param: The AtalaImage to save.
The type of compression to use on the image data.

member.summary: Creates an instance of PdfImage specifying fileName, frameIndex and compression.
member.param: The filename of the image you want added to the PDF.
The frame index to use for multipage TIFF images. Setting this to -1 will save every page to the PDF.
The type of compression to use on the image data.

member.name: P:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfImage.Compression
member.summary: Gets the compression used on the image data.
member.returns: The compression used on the image data.
member.remarks: If you specify a compression that is unsupported for a specific image, this will be substituted for a compatible compression.

member.name: T:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfMetadata
member.summary: Contains general information about the PDF file.
member.remarks:
PDF Metadata is used in the
PdfEncoder to indicate information such as Author, Creator, Keywords, etc.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfMetadata._ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of PdfMetadata.

member.name: M:Atalasoft.Imaging.Codec.Pdf.PdfMetadata._ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of PdfMetadata.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of PdfMetadata specifying title, author, subject, keywords, creator, producer, creationDate and modifiedDate.
member.param: The document's title.
The author of this PDF.
The subject of the document.
Keywords associated with the document.
The application that created the original document if the document was converted to PDF from another format.
The name of the application that produced this document if the document was converted to PDF from another format.
The creation date of this PDF.
The date and time the document was most recently modified.
